rukus.text: te'o kaya visaya babata puchatacha kari rahya che
te moti sucana babata vise
jena vise te'o matabheda kari rahya che
cokkasapane te'o najikamam jani lese
phari cokkasapane te'o najikamam jani lese
sum ame dharatine patharanum nathi banavyum
ane parvatone khunta (nathi banavya)
ane ame tamane jodakamam peda karya
ane ame tamari nidrane tamara arama mate ja banavi
ane ratane ame parado banavyo che
ane divasane kamani mate banavyo
ane ame tamara upara sata majabuta akasa banavya
ane eka camakato divo (surya) banavyo
ane vadalomam thi musaladhara varasada varasavyo
jethi tenathi anaja ane vanaspati upajave
ane harya-bharya baga. (Pana upajave)
ni:Sanka phesalano divasa nisrcita che
je divase suramam phukavamam avase, pachi tame jutha na jutha cali avaso
ane akasa kholi nakhavamam avase. Temam dvara ja dvara tha'i jase
ane parvatane calavavamam avase, to te maricika banine rahi jase
ni:Sanka dojhakha ghatamam che
duracari'o num thekanu te ja che
jemam te'o aganita varso sudhi padya rahese
na temam thandi tatha pinum cakhase
sivaya garama pani ane (vahetu) paru
(Temane) sampurna badalo malase
ni:Sanka te'o hisabani asa ja nahata rakhata
ane bebakithi amari ayatone juthalavata hata
ane ame dareka vastune gani ganine lakhi rakhi che
have, tame (potani karanini) maja cakho
